graphs
Class Phi0Histogram

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.uah.math.devices.Graph
                      graphs.Phi0Histogram
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Phi0Histogram
extends Graph

This class extends the Graph class published by the University of Alabama in Huntsville to graph an estimate of the ground state wavefunction. All of the members are public, so be careful how you manipulate them.

Author:
Ian Terrell
See Also:
Serialized Form

width - The width in pixels
height - the height in pixels
data - The data for the graph
Method Detail

paintComponent

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
This function draws the histogram with the given graphics element. The normalization algorithm is taken from the paper cited in DMC.java.

Parameters:
g - the Graphics element with which to draw the histogram.
